qas.question: What European age did Portugal spearhead?
Who was the Father of Prince Henry the Navigator?
Which three Atlantic archipelagos did Portugal discover?
By which path did Portugal discover a route to India?
What South American country did Portugal discover?

context: Portugal spearheaded European exploration of the world and <a0_0>the Age of Discovery<a0_0/>. Prince Henry the Navigator, son of <a1_0>King João I<a1_0/>, became the main sponsor and patron of this endeavour. During this period, Portugal explored the Atlantic Ocean, discovering several Atlantic archipelagos like the <a2_0>Azores, Madeira, and Cape Verde<a2_0/>, explored the African coast, colonized selected areas of Africa, discovered an eastern route to India via the <a3_0>Cape of Good Hope<a3_0/>, discovered <a4_0>Brazil<a4_0/>, explored the Indian Ocean, established trading routes throughout most of southern Asia, and sent the first direct European maritime trade and diplomatic missions to China and Japan.
